h1_title: Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish
h2_title: Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish Boss Fight and Guide
content: In the first phase, try to hold off on using your spells as much as you can. Instead, try to be aggressive and relentlessly attack the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains while he's on the ground.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Keeper_of_the_Flaming_Mountains_and_Yin-Yang_Fish.md', within the main section titled 'Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish', specifically from the subsection 'Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and Yin-Yang Fish Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
In the first phase, try to hold off on using your spells as much as you can. Instead, try to be aggressive and relentlessly attack the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains while he's on the ground.
